# YSEEKU Platform - SONATE

**Enterprise AI You Can Trust**

Unified platform for constitutional AI governance with three integrated modules: Detect, Lab, and Orchestrate.

## Repository

This is the consolidated monorepo replacing:
- ❌ `symbi-resonate` (deprecated → use @sonate/detect + @sonate/lab)
- ❌ `symbi-symphony` (deprecated → use @sonate/orchestrate)

**New canonical repository**: `github.com/s8ken/yseeku-platform`

## Quick Links

- **Production Platform**: https://yseeku.com (SONATE)
- **Research Hub**: https://gammatria.com (specifications)
- **Philosophy Portal**: https://symbi.world (manifesto)

## Architecture

```
@sonate/core        - Trust protocol (SHA-256, Ed25519, 6 principles)
@sonate/detect      - Real-time AI monitoring (5-dimension scoring)
@sonate/lab         - Double-blind experiments (research only)
@sonate/orchestrate - Agent management (W3C DID/VC, workflows)
```

## Installation

```bash
npm install
npm run build
```

## Documentation

See [README.md](./README.md) for full documentation.
